Package org.ten60.rdbms.accessor

Class Summary
ElementEncoderDecoderAccessor Encode or Decode an element and it's sub-tree From XML to RDBMS or RDBMS to XML.
EscapeXMLToSQLAccessor Escape all apostrophees and backslashes in all text elements to ensure SQL compatibility and to prevent SQL security hacks.
RDBMSAccessorImpl2 The RDBMS Accessor class.
TransactionWrapperAccessor A Wrapper which aquires a transactional database connection for use by a sub-service.
